export-entities.name: ACTION/Run
export-entities.pql:
ID 39 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "ACTION/Run" = (FALSE OR RUN)

export-entities.name: ACTION/Delete
export-entities.pql:
ID 40 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "ACTION/Delete" = (FALSE OR DELETE)

export-entities.name: ACTION/SAP Copy From
export-entities.pql:
ID 41 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
